name: WATERPONY
description:
WATERPONY by TRAB

CONTROLS: Use any key for everything. Enter clears all records.

PROTIP: Dive while midair & work up momentum like a swing set!

You've always wanted to be a sea serpent, be honest.

Made for Ludum Dare 33 in 72 hours. The theme was "You Are The Monster".

Every algorithm, asset & idea was created from scratch. Yeah, I made the music, isn't it great??
